subject: Gymnastics
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: For the second year in a row, Shawn Johnson won the all-around gold medal. Nastia Liukin, the only American to beat Johnson since Johnson has been competing as a senior, was second.
snippet: For the second year in a row, Shawn Johnson won the all-around gold medal. Nastia Liukin, the only American to beat Johnson since Johnson has been competing as a senior, was second.
